item.title: 美国参议员要求富国银行欢迎员工工会
item.description: 一群民主党参议员呼吁富国银行结束其所谓的针对员工工会的运动，称更具建设性的方法可以解决有毒的工作场所文化问题，并帮助该银行从阻碍其发展的丑闻中恢复过来。【原文：A group of Democratic senators called on Wells Fargo to end its alleged campaign against employee unions, saying a more constructive approach could address a toxic workplace culture and help the bank recover from scandals that prevented it from growing.】

item.title: Kering 解雇 Gucci 首席执行官，任命 Francesca Bellettini 领导该品牌
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）任命弗朗西斯卡-贝莱蒂尼（Francesca Bellettini）为其旗舰品牌古驰（Gucci）的新任首席执行官，接替上任仅九个月的斯特凡诺-坎蒂诺（Stefano Cantino），这是集团新任首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）领导下的首次重大管理层变动。【原文：French luxury group Kering has named Francesca Bellettini the new chief executive of its flagship Gucci brand, replacing Stefano Cantino after just nine months in the job, in the first major management change under new group CEO Luca de Meo.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会准备审查 IPO 强制性股东仲裁禁令
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构将于周三考虑一项政策调整，允许即将上市的公司强迫股东通过私下仲裁而非法庭诉讼解决争议，这一重大转变可能会削弱投资者的权利。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator will on Wednesday consider a policy change that could allow companies going public to force shareholders to resolve disputes in private arbitration rather than through court litigation, in a major shift that could weaken investor rights.】

item.title: 尽管面临政治阻力，宽松政策仍助长了亚洲新兴市场股市的乐观情绪
item.description: 基金经理本周表示，由于货币政策进一步宽松的前景超过了国内风险，投资者正在扩大对亚洲新兴股市的看涨押注。【原文：Investors are extending bullish bets on Asia’s emerging equities as prospects of further monetary easing outweigh domestic risks, fund managers said this week.】

item.title: 查理-柯克遇刺后，美国众议院小组要求在线论坛首席执行官作证
item.description: 美国众议院委员会周三要求 Discord、Steam、亚马逊旗下 Twitch 和 Reddit 的首席执行官在 10 月 8 日举行的听证会上就一些在线论坛用户的激进化问题作证。【原文：A U.S. House committee on Wednesday asked the CEOs of Discord, Steam, Amazon-owned Twitch , and Reddit to testify at an Oct. 8 hearing on the radicalization of some online forum users.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：美国财政部贝森特的抵押贷款承诺自相矛盾
item.description: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）此前同意同时占用两栋不同的房子作为他的 "主要住所"，这一协议与唐纳德-特朗普总统史无前例地解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）时所说的抵押贷款欺诈类似。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent previously agreed to occupy two different houses at the same time as his "principal residence," Bloomberg News reported, an agreement similar to one President Donald Trump has called mortgage fraud in his unprecedented bid to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会再次延长私募基金提供风险强化数据的最后期限
item.description: 意见分歧的美国证券交易委员会周三以 3-1 的投票结果第二次延长了私人投资基金遵守拜登时代要求加强信息披露的规定的最后期限。【原文：A divided U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday voted 3-1 to extend for a second time the deadline for private investment funds to comply with Biden-era regulations requiring enhanced disclosures.】

item.title: 红鸟IMI首席执行官扎克：监管阻碍英国经济增长
item.description: 阿布扎比支持的红鸟国际货币基金组织（RedBird IMI）首席执行官杰夫-扎克（Jeff Zucker）说，英国对媒体和金融市场的监管阻碍了投资，阻碍了经济增长。【原文：Jeff Zucker, the chief executive of Abu Dhabi-backed RedBird IMI, said Britain's regulation of media and financial markets was deterring investment and holding back economic growth.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构恢复对玛氏和凯兰诺华的调查，将于 12 月 19 日做出决定
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会网站上的最新消息，欧盟反垄断监管机构已恢复对糖果制造商玛氏以 360 亿美元收购品客制造商凯兰诺华的调查，并将做出决定的最后期限定在 12 月 19 日。【原文：EU antitrust regulators have resumed their investigation into candy maker Mars' $36 billion bid for Pringles maker Kellanova , setting a December 19 deadline for their decision, according to an update on the European Commission website.】

item.title: 聚焦：阿玛尼的价值超越风格
item.description: 业内人士和分析师表示，阿玛尼的经济价值远不止其停滞不前的时装业务，潜在的竞购者很可能会仔细研究以这位已故设计师的名字销售的香水和镜框所带来的销售额。【原文：Armani's economic value goes well beyond its stagnating fashion business and potential bidders are likely to take a close look at sales generated by fragrances and frames sold under the late designer's name, industry sources and analysts say.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利合并两个投资银行团队，成立全球电力与能源集团，备忘录称
item.description: 摩根士丹利正在将全球能源和全球电力与公用事业两个投资银行团队合并为一个新的全球电力与能源集团。【原文：Morgan Stanley is combining two investment banking teams, Global Energy and Global Power and Utilities, into a new Global Power and Energy Group.】

item.title: 墨西哥在《美国与墨西哥关于建立更紧密经贸关系的协定》（USMCA）审议前启动公众咨询程序
item.description: 墨西哥政府官方公报周三称，墨西哥已启动公众咨询程序，以收集有关美国-墨西哥-加拿大贸易协定（USMCA）运作的信息。【原文：Mexico has started a public consultation process to gather information on the functioning of the United States-Mexico-Canada trade agreement (USMCA), the government's official gazette said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在联合国航空大会召开之前，环境问题成为航空公司集团的主要优先事项
item.description: 贸易机构国际航空运输协会（IATA）负责人周三告诉记者，在下周联合国召开的一次重要会议之前，全球排放协议仍是航空公司的一个重要优先事项，尽管人们对航空业能否实现自己的环保目标持怀疑态度。【原文：A global emissions deal remains a key priority for airlines ahead of a key U.N. gathering next week, despite skepticism that the industry will hit their own environmental targets, the head of trade body IATA told reporters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 边疆航空公司首席执行官称低成本航空公司模式 "生机勃勃
item.description: 边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）首席执行官巴里-比弗（Barry Biffle）说，超低成本航空公司模式在美国 "生机勃勃"，而业内同行则声称这种模式正在挣扎。【原文：Frontier Airlines CEO Barry Biffle said the ultra-low- cost carrier model is 'alive and well' in the United States amid claims from industry peers that the model is struggling.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率降至三年低点，指出经济面临风险
item.description: 加拿大央行周三将其关键政策利率下调至 2.5% 的三年低点，这是六个月来的首次下调，理由是就业市场疲软以及对通胀潜在压力的担忧减少。【原文：The Bank of Canada reduced its key policy rate to a three-year-low of 2.5% on Wednesday, the first cut in six months, citing a weak jobs market and less concern about underlying pressures on inflation.】

item.title: 彪马在媒体报道投资者准备收购后大涨
item.description: 周三，彪马股价大涨 10%，交易员们指出，有媒体报道称，有关各方正在为收购这家德国运动服制造商做准备。【原文：Shares in Puma jumped 10% on Wednesday, with traders pointing to a media report that parties involved were preparing for a potential takeover of the German sportswear maker.】

item.title: 美联储常备回购机制有望在 9 月底接受大考
item.description: 美联储的利率控制流动性机制将在本月底进行一次大力度锻炼，这对美国央行的资产负债表清算进程能走多远将产生重大影响。【原文：Federal Reserve interest rate-control liquidity facilities are set for a heavy-duty workout into the close of the month, with big implications for how much farther the U.S. central bank can take its balance sheet wind-down process.】

item.title: 以色列 Glilot Capital 公司为新的人工智能和网络安全投资项目融资 5 亿美元
item.description: 以色列最大的风险投资基金之一格利洛特资本公司（Glilot Capital）周三表示，它已为两支新的早期基金筹集了 5 亿美元，用于投资快速发展的以色列人工智能和网络安全初创企业。【原文：Glilot Capital, one of Israel's largest venture capital funds, said on Wednesday it had raised $500 million for two new early-stage funds to invest in fast-growing Israeli AI and cybersecurity startups.】

item.title: Waymo 将在纳什维尔的 Lyft 顺风车网络上提供自动驾驶乘车服务
item.description: Alphabet旗下的Waymo公司计划明年开始与打车公司Lyft合作，在纳什维尔提供自动驾驶出租车服务。【原文：Alphabet’s Waymo plans to start offering autonomous cab rides in Nashville next year in collaboration with ride-hailing firm Lyft , the two companies said.】

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官告诉彭博电视台他短期内不会离职
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）周三在接受彭博电视采访时表示，他不会在短期内离开银行，但他补充说，公司必须物色有经验的候选人来管理公司的未来。【原文：Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan said on Wednesday he is not leaving the bank in the short term, but added the company has to line up candidates with experience to run the company in the future, according to an interview on Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: 乌克兰和美国宣布向联合基金捐款 1.5 亿美元，作为矿产交易的一部分
item.description: 乌克兰官员周三表示，乌克兰和美国国际开发金融公司宣布将分别向一个联合投资基金投入 7500 万美元，该基金是基辅与华盛顿达成的矿产交易的一部分。【原文：Ukraine and the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation announced they would each commit $75 million to a joint investment fund that is part of Kyiv's minerals deal with Washington, officials said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 8 月单户住宅开工量和建筑许可量下降
item.description: 在未售出的新房过剩和劳动力市场疲软的影响下，美国 8 月份的独栋住宅建设和未来建设许可出现下降，但抵押贷款利率却在下降。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding and permits for future construction dropped in August amid a glut of unsold new houses and a softening labor market, shrugging off falling mortgage rates.】

item.title: 英国监管机构建议加密货币公司免于遵守 "诚信 "和其他规则
item.description: 根据英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）周三提出的新建议，英国的加密货币公司可以不受确保金融服务公司诚信经营和维护客户利益的规则的约束。【原文：Crypto firms in Britain could be exempted from rules that ensure financial services companies act with integrity and in the interests of customers, under new proposals outlined by the Financial Conduct Authority on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊投资逾 10 亿美元提高员工薪酬并降低医疗成本
item.description: 科技巨头亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三表示，该公司将投资超过 10 亿美元，用于提高美国执行和运输员工的薪酬并降低医疗保健成本。【原文：Amazon.com is investing over $1 billion to raise pay and lower health care costs for U.S. fulfillment and transportation employees, the tech giant said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司工人开始无限期罢工
item.description: 圣若泽多斯坎波斯金属工人工会在一份声明中说，巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司的金属工人周三举行了无限期罢工，要求增加工资和签署集体劳动协议。【原文：Metalworkers at Brazilian planemaker Embraer went on strike on Wednesday for an indefinite time, demanding wage increases and the signing of a collective labor agreement, the Metal Workers Union from Sao Jose dos Campos said in a statement.】

item.title: 艾略特透露 20 亿美元入股并支持领导层后，Workday 公司股价上涨
item.description: 在激进投资者埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）宣布持有该公司超过 20 亿美元的股份并支持其领导层之后，Workday 的股价在周三收盘前上涨了近 10%。【原文：Shares of Workday rose nearly 10% before the bell on Wednesday, after activist investor Elliott Management unveiled a stake of more than $2 billion in the company and backed its leadership.】

item.title: 前英国央行副行长警告特朗普可能打开金融支付 "致命开关
item.description: 英国央行的一位前高级官员说，那些视自己为美国盟友的国家现在正在考虑，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府是否有一天会破坏它们的支付系统，以施加外交压力。【原文：Countries that see themselves as U.S. allies are now considering whether President Donald Trump's administration could one day disrupt their payments systems to exert diplomatic pressure, a former top Bank of England official has said.】

item.title: 吉姆-宾为 F1 首次亮相的凯迪拉克增添美国精神
item.description: 肯塔基波本威士忌品牌吉姆-宾（Jim Beam）和一级方程式赛车新军凯迪拉克于本周三宣布建立合作伙伴关系，以彰显双方的历史渊源，并为车队增添美国精神。【原文：Kentucky bourbon brand Jim Beam and Formula One newcomers Cadillac announced a partnership on Wednesday highlighting their historic ties and adding to the team's American spirit.】

item.title: 台湾展示与美国军火制造商联合制造的首枚导弹
item.description: 台湾周三公布了与一家美国公司联合制造的首枚导弹，标志着台北与华盛顿为应对中国军事威胁而快速发展的防务合作迈出了重要一步。【原文：Taiwan unveiled its first missile to be jointly manufactured with a U.S. company on Wednesday, marking a major step in the fast-growing defence cooperation between Taipei and Washington to counter China's military threat.】

item.title: Rithm Capital 拟以 16 亿美元收购房地产投资信托公司派拉蒙集团
item.description: 全球资产管理公司 Rithm Capital 周三表示，已同意以 16 亿美元现金收购房地产投资信托公司派拉蒙集团。【原文：Global asset management company Rithm Capital on Wednesday said it had agreed to acquire real estate investment trust Paramount Group for $1.6 billion in cash.】
